seriesJson.title: Hold your breath
seriesJson.description: This series focuses on air pollution and its impact on America.

node.title: Tomorrow's air
node.description: This program focuses on the quality of air in the future.

node.title: The private citizen in the fight for clean air
node.description: This program focuses on the impact that private citizens can have when they battle air pollution.

node.title: Air pollution control in the community, part one
node.description: This program focuses on air pollution control from a community perspective.

node.title: Air pollution control in the community, part two
node.description: This program focuses on air pollution control from a community perspective.

node.title: Air pollution and the industries, part three
node.description: This program focuses on how coal and chemical industries deal with air pollution.

node.title: Air pollution and the industries, part two
node.description: This program continues to focus on how industries deal with air pollution.

node.title: Air pollution and the industries, part one
node.description: This program focuses on how industries deal with air pollution.

node.title: Pollution in your backyard
node.description: This program seeks to personalize the impact of air pollution by focusing on a woman who has been fighting air pollution in Chicago for twenty years.

node.title: Agricultural problems caused by air pollution
node.description: This program focuses on the financial costs of air pollution, particularly as it relates to agriculture.

node.title: The economic cost of pollution
node.description: This program focuses on the financial costs of air pollution.

node.title: Air pollution and cancer
node.description: This program focuses on air pollution role in causing cancer.

node.title: Day to day health effects
node.description: This program focuses on the general health effects of air pollution.

node.title: Acute episodes
node.description: This program focuses on episodes when poor air quality became a crisis.
